items.description:
Need some yin and yang in your life?

 
This sherlock by BoroTech Glass is a traditional style that won't let you down. Shorter than your average gandalf pipe this smokecessary is great if you're on the move. The "Darklight" is a beauty and sure to impress. Plus at this price, this sherlock is a deal!

 
This pipe is made in the fashionable sherlock style, and is easy to hold.
items.title: BoroTech Glass "Darklight" Gandalf Pipe

items.description:
A Clean Pipe is a Happy Pipe!

 
One of the secrets to the best smoke sessions is a clean water pipe. Clean pipes do not only look better, but have less bacteria, better function, the smoke tastes better. These Res Caps, from Resolution Colorado, slide over any openings and provide a secure cover to keep any cleaning solution from spilling.

 
 1 Large and 2 Small Caps Included
 Helps to Block Odor in Storage
 Act as Bumpers While Traveling
items.title: Resolution Res Caps in Black
